params.name: pred
params.description: The predicted value is a Tensor with dtype float32 or float64.Shape is [batch_size, 1].

params.name: label
params.description: The ground truth value is Tensor with dtype int64, and itsshape is [batch_size, 1].

return.description: A tuple of preds and label. Each shape is[batch_size, 1], with dtype float32 or float64.
